text: Ate yada karom uha samam jadom musa ne apani kauma la'i pani magi'a. Maim kiha ki apani soti (danga) pathara te maro, tam usa vicom baram jharane vaga nikale. Hara ika varaga ne apana apana patana pachana li'a. Kha'u ate pi'u alaha de dite ho'e rizaka com ate dharati te vigara phaila'una vale bana ke na phiro
